attributes.action: We want an investigation into the religious bias of the police and judiciary.
attributes.additional_details: The seemingly obvious religious bias in the police and judiciary is badly eroding the trust the public have in these institutions and facts need to be shown, either supporting or denying the claim of bias.
attributes.background: There should be an immediate and short investigation into the handling of cases by the police and judiciary comparing the results based on the religious beliefs of the suspect, including numbers of those not charged.
